si_contact_institution: Department of Biology, University of New Mexico, USA
si_name: PJSEV -Rainfall Manipulation Experiment - Sevilleta NWR, USA
si_remarks: A) Pinon-Juniper Experimental Rainfall Manipulation Experiment, B) Note; Recent disturbance has occured (in addition to drought) leading to whole tree mortality and/or significant canopy dieback due to biotic pest agents, including bark beetles (PIED), twig beetles (PIED), and stem boring beetles (JUMO).
